flawed_nl_solution:
Tyler gives away 21 / 3 = <<21/3=7.0>>7.0 CDs
After giving away a third of his CDs, Tyler has 21 - 7.0 = <<21-7.0=19.0>>19.0 CDs
After buying new CDs, Tyler has 19.0 + 8 = <<19.0+8=27.0>>27.0 CDs

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 14.0, not 19.0. This appears to be a minor miscalculation.
